statements: DELETE FROM geothermal_data WHERE production_rate IS NULL;
DELETE FROM geothermal_data WHERE temperature < 100 AND production_rate IS NULL;
DELETE FROM geothermal_data WHERE pressure > 200 OR production_rate > 500;
DELETE FROM energy_extraction WHERE reservoir_id = 1 AND extraction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM geothermal_reservoir_data WHERE temperature > 150 AND pressure < 200
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE reservoir_id = 1 AND temperature < 50.0;
DELETE FROM pressure WHERE pressure_value > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
